actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize additional funds to the Secretary of the Interior for development of an existing unit of the national park system in St. Louis, Mo.

summary.text: Authorizes the appropriation of additional funds to the Secretary of the Interior for development of the Jefferson National Expansion Memorial Historic Site, Saint Louis, Missouri.

titles.title: A bill to authorize additional funds to the Secretary of the Interior for development of an existing unit of the national park system in St. Louis, Mo.
